author: jleroux
msg: A patch from Sascha Rodekamp "jQuery Lookup Layer Transformation" (https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/OFBIZ-3841) - OFBIZ-3841
* The Dialog close when clicking outside
There is a small bug: the lookups are not dimensioned (very small), but I prefer to commit the work done, as it'es certainly a small thing (quickly looking I did not find the reason)
